alert.note: Alert for Hawkins; Northwest Greene; Washington (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 8:46PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT HAWKINS...NORTHWESTERN WASHINGTON AND CENTRAL GREENE COUNTIES THROUGH 1030 PM EDT... At 946 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms near Rogersville, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Johnson City, Greeneville, Rogersville, Tusculum, Surgoinsville, Church Hill, Mosheim, Baileyton, Leesburg, and Chucky. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
